body.name: Soft Memory Foam Bean Bag Chair for Toddlers - Modern Lounger for Nursery, Playroom, or Living Room
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 8 hrs 1 min
features: Absolutely Comfy & Fun For Kids To Relax: Create a calm, cozy space for your kids to sit, lounge & hang out! ZICOTOs’ memory foam filled bean bag chairs for kids with a soft & sturdy shredded foam filling, adjust snugly to your kids’ body. A great place to read, play & chill

Stylish Kids Chair - Suitable For Any Interior: Your kids (recommended: 18+ months) will love the giant kids chair bean bag style - and so will you! Brown sugar colored it seamlessly blends with your home’s furniture decor and is a great pick for living rooms, kids’ rooms & playrooms

Premium Design With Washable Cover: 100% safe, kid friendly & super practical - the top-notch toddler furniture memory foam bean bag chair features a strong zipper, as well as a removable polyester corduroy cover for easy machine wash, both ensuring durability for many years to come

Perfectly Sized - Relaxing Just Like Grown Ups Do: Watch your youngster chilling out in the kids chairs - simply adorable! The chair bag is specifically designed so that kids up to 5 years old can cozily sit (L 29”, W21”, H 15”, sitting height 7.5”)

Let It Unfold & Make Your Kids Eyes Sparkle: For a simplified transport, the chair is vacuum-packed. Once unboxed, give it up to 48 hrs to expand to its final shape, quickly assemble by putting the cover over the bag - and watch your kids’ heartwarming anticipation
body.description: ZICOTOs’ Cozy Chair For Your Kids: Give Your Kids a Comfy and Fun Place To Sit & Relax! Absolutely adorable! Watch your kiddos chill just like the adults do in their cute memory foam filled bean bag chair. The sturdy chair for kids offers a soft and squishy place for your youngsters to hang out, enjoy their favorite tv shows, read a captivating book or to play fun games. Thanks to the comfortable design and shredded foam filling the chair snugly adjusts to your kids’ body. The kids chair bean bag style is made of memory foam is sized especially for long-term use. Recommended age is from 18 months up to 5 years. Dimensions: 15” back height, 7.5” sitting height, 29” length, 21” width. Fits beautifully just about anywhere in your home as furniture - ultra stylish & cool! Whether the bean bag finds its place in your living room, a kids’ room or playroom, thanks to its classic design it blends with any interior or decor seamlessly. 100% kid friendly - and family approved! Fully made from top-notch materials, from the soft shredded foam filling to the durable polyester corduroy cover and strong zipper, you can absolutely rely on the kids chairs to provide safe, all-day comfort for your kid. You can even remove the cover and wash it in the washing machine. Let’s face it: the likelihood of the memory foam filled beanbag chair getting a few spills is fairly high, nothing more practical & hygienic than a washable cover! Let it fully unfold, assemble it with ease and make your kids' eyes shine! The kids chair is vacuum-packed for simplified, environmentally friendly transport. It’ll take approximately 48 hours to fully expand. Once in its final form, you can simply put the cover over the foam bag and let those cozy times begin for your kid. Please note: the bean bag styled kids chair comes in two pieces - the foam bag and one cover (in your chosen color). So you’ll have it ready to chill in no time by simply adding the cover to the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not as expected
reviews.reviewText: As you can see from the photos this is not a chair but a beanbag. Does not keep its form. I did as instructed upon opening & let sit over 72 hrs. Did exactly as instructed in video. Not to happy since I really wanted a chair for my 20 month old grandson. My cat loves it tho since it is more like a cat bed. Lol So if u want a bean bag or cat bed this is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product defective-did not inflate properly
reviews.reviewText: The cushion is just a few unconnected lumps of lumpy foam. It's a blob with no shape. It not even a good bean bag. Would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good chair for the price
reviews.reviewText: when i originally got the chair it had no reviews so i took a chance on it and i have to say it’s great for the price. it is not an upright sitting couch, those go for $60+ so if that’s what you’re looking for then this isn’t it, but my toddler is a little over 2 ft and loves to lay on it. I put a throw pillow in the back and some cardboard on the sides to give it a little more shape and sturdiness but all in all it’s exactly what was advertised in my opinion. id say it will fit until up to about 2 years old. the cover is also decent material and it’s comfy, my fiancé and i will lay on it sometimes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these for my boys for Christmas. I was a little nervous because of the reviews saying it looked like a pillow on the floor. But these are so awesome and that couldn’t be farther from the truth. They both love them. They are super low profile so they can snuggle up and take a nap or we can chill and have a story time in our little nook. My kids are 1 1/2 and 3 and it’s the perfect size for them and for the years ahead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Staple to our living room.
reviews.reviewText: Great little chair for my toddler! AND our newborn loves napping in it. Dog thinks it’s his.Only con which is also a pro, but its memory foam makes it so it often needs “refluffed” but the memory foam is very comfortable.But it was easy to assemble, had a weird fish smell when it first came out of the box but quickly went away within the first week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as cushioned as expected.
reviews.reviewText: Great little chair for a toddler but not as cushiony as expected. Memory foam is a little sturdy. But may wear down with use. Still a great piece of furniture for relaxing and watching cartoons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Didn't take shape. Such a bummer!
reviews.reviewText: The chair come with a bunch of expandable foam pieces and really doesn't take the shape shown in the picture. I've tried to manipulate it several ways to make it form into the cushion casing and I ha ent been able to get it to do so. Otherwise the fabric is nice. I just wish we would have gone with something better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I saw some reviews about not fluffing up, I opened it and broke up pieces a bit and mine fluffed up just fine. My little one loves it for her calm down corner. It’s the perfect size for toddlers.
